content.detailedDescription:
Was awakened at approximately midnight,  october 31/november 1, 2015 due to a rumbling noise  that lasted for about 2 minutes. 
was so intense that it mildly shook the house. 
local news said there was no weather events that would have caused such noise and the reports of the incident appear to be widespread in the columbus ohio area.
content.summary: Extremely loud rumbling noise over columbus ohio

content.detailedDescription: I was 11yrs old 1965 , fishing on houghton lake mi.  around 6pm evening. im not sure who first notice it , i think i ask my dad what it was. it was directly overhead around 500 ft up. round silver disk. we watched it for around an hour. i remember me dad and uncle begining to get alittle nervious. i remember , this also made me scared . there seemed to be some missing time in volved. next thing i remembered is heading back in to shore. it was after dark.I remember watching as it turned orange  and shot straight up. i ask my dad years later he had no memory of the event. i found this strange sence it was such a big deal at the time.
content.summary: Im 63 now,this happen when i was out fishing with my dad and uncle.

content.detailedDescription:
Went for a short hike with my child on a mountain in nantahala forests. somewhat overcast day. taking pictures of flowers and landscape. the fist picture i noticed it and dismissed it as a glare on the lense. it wasn't until the end of october when i noticed it again in a different picture that i had taken a little farther down the trail. i had taken pictures in between these two pictures of other things where the object did not show up.
so i looked closers at the two pictures and noticed it had moved down the trail.
i looked at it over and over again and zooming in on it i noticed that it had distinct features and had actually moved from hovering over the bushes to the next picture in which it had receded in to the woods a few feet. it seemed to hover about the same distance off the ground in both pictures
i have no idea what it is but it doesn't look like a glare or debris on the lenses to me. it was taken on a samsung galaxy 16mp phone.
you know everything i know about these pictures now. i am submitting this in good faith that you will please keep my identify annonamous!
i have nothing to gain from this other than curiosity of what you expert conclusion is.
many of my friends and family have seen these pictures and none of us can come up with an explaination.
these were taken in a very secluded area for wildlife habitat management.
again, please,in good faith, do not share any of my personal information with the publiic! i would love a reply when or if you come to any conclusions.
i also hope these pictures will help you with any investigations or scientific studies that you are working on.
content.summary: Found in 2 different pictures taken about 5-10 min apart. didn't notice anomaly until few weeks later.

content.detailedDescription: 4 lights flickering orange in a line went from north to south making no noise. i saw this twice
content.summary: 4 orange red lights flickering going in a straight line in silence

content.detailedDescription: From the back porch of my house overhead in the sky i first thought i saw the lights of a very low flying large aircraft. it seemed to be too low and larger than a commercial aircraft. next i was amazed that a lighted object that large was silent and moving relatively slow for  its size. i jumped over the railing of the porch into the yard to get a better look. the object was a wing like in the shape of a v or boomerang with lights along both angles. it disappeared from my view in a short time do to trees. it flew south towards elevated railroad tracks about a block away. i thought for sure i would hear something about it in the news because it was such a strange sighting and someone else most likely would have spotted it also. it was after dark and its flight was silent, but i find it hard to believe i was the only person that seen it. i don't strongly believe one way or the other whether more ufos exist. i do know i did see this ufo many years ago. at the time i was a young teenager. i was sober and not under the influence of any medications or drugs of any kind. i talk about this experience rarely because i know what i saw and don't need to convince anyone of it. only now have i found an organization that may be interested in it and i always thought it should be reported, but didn't know how to go about it.
content.summary: Observed large lighted wing like object overhead in ste shape of a boomerang in the evening after dark.

content.detailedDescription: Not the first time i have seen this large radish orange light but it's bigger now.
content.summary: Large red or orange light in sky

content.detailedDescription: I was arriving home at about 21:43pm it was halloween night. as i was entered my house i had forgotten something in my car, when i walked out my house the object caught my eye and i begun taking the two photos with my phone and decided a video would be better. i dont know what the object was, but i have alwayd hoped to have caught a ufo on camera, as the phenomenon has always fascinated me and i have alwayd believed in et's. i dont know if there were other people who saw what i did but hopefully i was not.
content.summary: Quiet and moving. looked like it was flickering.

content.detailedDescription: i was helping my neighbor install a garage heater when i went to get some tools from my garage when i observed a red/orange glowing orb traveling from north to northeast for about 8 seconds with no noise.  i thought it might be the red wing lights on airplane but noticed entire object was glowing.  i've seen meteors and space garbage reentry before and this was a lot slower but way faster than a jet or airplane.  the object was just above cloud level so it disappeared when it went behind a cloud bank.  the path was straight and consistent but the speed was what didn't make any sense to me. i stood there for a minuet or two waiting to see if there was a trailing light of some sort but didn't see any.
content.summary: Red/orange glowing orb with no noise traveling faster than jet but slower than meteor

content.detailedDescription: I woke up to a few beings around me asking me questions and told me not be afraid. then i remember something being put in the side of my head like a huge needle.Then i fell back asleep when i woke up i had a huge bump on the side of my head. i was never the same.
content.summary: No ufo seen but experienced something next to me

content.detailedDescription: Standing outside home in central phoenix on 10/31/2015 around 21:15 local time with spouse.  looked up and saw a lights in a "v" formation moving from ne to sw.  elevation was difficult to discern.  best guess is 15,000 feet?  object was moving fast, i picked it up at a reasonably low angle looking up, it was directly overhead in less than three seconds, which is where my wife picked it up visually.  we traversed our point of view to watch it continue moving southwest and after it passed overhead the lights grew faint and the object disappeared into the night sky.  at one point, i actually did think it might be a flock of birds because the triangle shape seemed to flex like a bow recovering its shape, before it solidified into a solid v again, but the speed was way too fast and the elevation way too high, plus the lights were not reflective but appeared to be very faint sources of light.  i've ruled out fighters flying in a "v" formation as well as there was no sound and fighters in formation at that elevation would have taken longer to traverse the sky.  the craft moved from one edge of the horizon to within 30% of the opposite horizon in less than 10 seconds.  hoping others report seeing the same thing at the same time.
content.summary: Single v-shaped object over phoenix, az on 10/31/2015 at 21:15 local time

content.detailedDescription: I was on my lunch break sitting in my vehicle,when looking up though the sun roof i noticed a misty cloud moving in the opposite direction of the other clouds when i saw a solid shape in the mist which really got my attention,i was then i noticed more solid shapes.As i looked on i saw they attached to a white tri-angled shaped craft.I watched it disappear into the clouds when i saw a second craft right behind it.I all seemed surreal,but i'm a non-drinker or drug user so i know what i saw was real
content.summary: 2 traveling south in a misty cloud against the drift of the natural clouds

content.detailedDescription: I was on my lunch break sitting in my vehicle,when looking up though the sun roof i noticed a misty cloud moving in the opposite direction of the other clouds when i saw a solid shape in the mist which really got my attention,i was then i noticed more solid shapes.As i looked on i saw they attached to a white tri-angled shaped craft.I watched it disappear into the clouds when i saw a second craft right behind it.I all seemed surreal,but i'm a non-drinker or drug user so i know what i saw was real
content.summary: 2 traveling south in a misty cloud against the drift of the natural clouds

content.detailedDescription: I was on the front porch with my mom sitting and smoking. when out of know where the super bright object appeared to the east. it was heading west when my mom said my name and look! i then saw the object locked my eyes on it as it was headed toward us and then stopped above the houses at my fence row. the object was really bright and pulsating an orangish reddish and almost yellow at times. when we said to each other what the hell is that. the object hovered for a second then turned due north increasing speed until it blinked out or disappeared in to the clouds. total event was likely 1-2 minutes. we live close to port columbus airport and see planes and choppers daily. also there was a plane to the north making a banking turn around the airport at the same time we saw the object! i don't think i will be sleeping tonight or any time soon. it was totally baffling! we have never seen anything like that before.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Oval shaped very bright pulsating orange red almost yellow at times object came from east no noise stopped then turned north went off in the distance and blinked out!

content.detailedDescription: Traveling south on route 17 in ramsey, new jersey. both my wife and i observed a city directly ahead of us en-route to olive garden restaurant, floating in the clouds and gleaming with a pinkish, sunset-type hue. the buildings were all in neat rows, and all buildings were rectangular in shape. there were a few that resembled skyscrapers, and there was a very prominent skyscraper in the front row of buildings, approximately in the middle of the row. there are no cities of this resemblance in northern new jersey anywhere relatively south of our observed location.
content.summary: Floating city

content.detailedDescription: I arrive home and decide to put my dog out for necessities and when i open the door i look up like i usualy do,and  i saw 50 more light almost all together but 2 or 3 more distant and one of them was very far but catch up with the others. some were blinking others were not and they were all moving not to fast but faster then we usualy see when we look at a plain. almost 10 peolpe saw the same thing as i did i couldn t take a picture ou a video because the resolution of my phone. we saw them for almost 5 minutes and it was beautiful strange and almost sacry, they was so many all together some blinking others not and they just vanish direction north. 15 minutes later we hear something that sounded like several military air plains.
content.summary: Just saw  50 more lights in the sky all moving together.

content.detailedDescription: We were working in pass christian, miss. tiling a new home. it was a pretty morning so one of my guys decided to take a few pictures of the sunrise from the second story bed room window the date was 10/28/15, it was about 7:15 am, there was only about 1 minute between pictures, while taking the pictures nothing abnormal was noticed, it was only afterwards when viewing them that we noticed the large bright saucer shaped object with a brightly glowing dome on top, my guess is that the object was moving too fast to see it while taking the pictures, and the camera actually caught it in that one frame.I went to a vintage ww11 air show recently in new orleans and took many pics of the planes , i even flew in a b-17 and a b-25, while in the air i took many pics, and the camera actually stopped the props in each frame, this is what i think happened that morning, you can see that the ufo is quite large and is very clear, it is in the first picture taken and not the second, the camera angle for each picture is almost exactly the same.I have been interested and watch ufo shows for a great many years now, i was never convinced they were real, but this one picture has changed my mind only because i was there, i still can hardly believe it, but the photo doesnt lie, as you will agree once you examine it, and it is so clear, not like the grainy ones you usually see in the shows on tv.
content.summary: Took two sunrise pictures that morning, didnt notice the ufo until looking at the pictures, the pics were taken only about two minutes apart.

content.detailedDescription: I was living alone at the time. i had a bird, dog, and cat. for several nights around the same time each night, i felt a strange feeling, my dog and cat became restless, and my bird (a parakeet) would contiously squawk during each experience. each night i felt a presence, but when i would get up to investigate, i saw nothing. the last night i experienced this phenomenon, i don't remember getting up to investigate, i simply awoke in the morning. while i was shaving that morning, i noticed 2 scars, white in color, on either side of my throat, almost as if i had been impaled through the neck. the scars of of uniform size, and approximately 1/4 of an inch in diameter. since this experience, i have felt anxiety and a sense that someone is watching me. i have been nervous to come forward up to this point, but i spend many of my nights unable to sleep since this event occurred.
content.summary: Did not see a craft.

content.detailedDescription: A few yrs ago i submitted what i saw. i just had to tell someone about it. but lately i have been having dreams of a light based generator. i know how it looks and how it should function. i don't have anyone to help me build it. last night i had a dream that felt like i should be able to build the object in my dream and what the light generators are for. it was of 3 spheres with in each other. the out sphere was the outside of the ship. the 2nd sphere held the generators and the middle sphere controlled everything. i believe the craft was powered by a combination of electricity around the outside of the craft along with a reverse magnetic drive. you can believe what i say or you don't have to. i just needed to tell someone about this. the light generator i believe will work if one can be built. i just need help making it into a working reality. i don't want to put the hole detail into how to build one on here. i don't want to fine out in a yr or 2 that someone built one using my complete layout of it shape and function. if you are ever in southwest michigan i would mind talking with someone about it. thankyou for letting me share this with you. i'm a little confused why i'm having these dreams. maybe i was given these dreams for the better cause of or world.
content.summary: Saw the object on my way to catch school bus

content.detailedDescription:
Witness description of ufo sighting

this is a demonstration case for mufon fi training
content.summary: This is an example case: assigned to craig lang for fi training

content.detailedDescription:
We were on the 3rd floor dorm. we could not sleep - we were talking. it was in the room and around eight classmates.
i felt - extrasensory - someone told me to look out the window at the sky. and i saw as the over building dormitory for discovery of a large black triangular object. flew silently and slowly - in the corners of the object to see the three circles - like light - just not shine. on the underside of the object to see the grid cross - tabs. our feelings - we had fear. we shouted and waved to the object.
the object flew silently ne direction. then silence, and suddenly disappeared.
all the dormitories mysteriously deep sleep.
we had fear of the mysterious silence around. me after this experience embarking blood from the nose.
when the object disappears appeared in the sky a falling fireball.
content.summary: Big black triangular object

content.detailedDescription:
Around 3 am i heard loud crashing from my backyard.  i went to investigate and found thousands of small creatures all huddled around in a circle.  there was a small mound of dirt on the ground with a hole at the top that they were pouring out of.  in the distance i heard a great noise like a jet airplane coming straight toward my yard.

instead of scattering, the small creatures all began to swarm my body and enter every uncovered orifice.  at this point i fell unconscious and saw their craft appear in my yard where they began taking small samples of fluid from my body and loading it into their ship.

this entire process took between 10-12 hours.  please have my daughter call me to help as i believe she has been trying to reach me and if you've heard from her she can help.
content.summary: Extremely small aliens continue to flood yard

content.detailedDescription:
The night of october 24 was absolutely clear and the moon was nearing the full moon phase thus was very bright. to give you an idea of position let me say that the balcony from which i saw this object faces west. i went out to the balcony at approximately 7:30pm. the moon was sse of my location at approximately at 50 degree angle 0ver the horizon. i had full view of the night sky. 
after 10 or so minutes from being outside, toward the west i saw what appeared to be ripples in the air (similar to those formed by a boat as it moves in water) being created by something moving forward behind them. from my position, i estimate that i saw these "ripples" at an elevation of 35-40 degrees above the horizon. these "ripples" appeared whitish in color perhaps because of the reflection of the city lights below. the "ripples" were visible for a couple of seconds sufficient time to eliminate the possibility of birds but plenty of times to keep me looking at whatever that was.
as i stared at these "ripples" and watch them disappear to give view to an object traveling in the direction of my location. it was a v shaped craft with circles along each side of the v. it was a non-reflective type of black or dark grey color (contrasted with the night sky due to the shining moon). the circles (perhaps lights?) were gray-white but were not reflecting outside the craft similar to seeing the interior lights of a house from the outside. the craft had no nav lights at all which is rare when we consider the fact that it was flying in the airspace of the sfo, oak, sjc airports. the aircraf was absolutely silent and had no visible engines, afterburners or indication of a power source. from the first instant i saw the "ripples" to the time the craft went over the balcony where i was standing i estimate that it was perhaps 6 seconds. that said, i did have a perfect view of this craft to clearly identify the shape and the circles on each side and the tip because it passed almost overhead. i can not tell how high it was because i had no points of reference given the clear night. what i can say is that assuming that it was at the altitude of aircraft approaching sfo international this craft was much larger than a 747 cargo plane and moved a lot faster.
once the craft went over the balcony traveling west to east i lost visibility as it got obscured by the roof of the house. a few seconds later i saw it again this time heading north-north east. i do not know if it turned or did a loop to change directions while behind the house. at this stage i saw the back of the craft and followed it by looking at the white circles underneath for a few more seconds. not sure if it was going so fast that i lost visibility due to distance or if the craft turned off those under body lights that i was using as reference.  the total time i had this craft in sight was about 10-15 seconds. it took me a lot longer to write this report.  i'd be interested in hearing comments from people who have seen something similar to what i have described here. let me say that i had never seen anything like this before and, between you and i, i'd like to have the opportunity to see it again.
content.summary: V shaped craft over fremont ca

content.detailedDescription: Never been to london before. so i was taking pictures of everything. waited till i was able to get the best shot of places with least interference of objects and people. i did not notice anything in the sky as i was taking pictures. i noticed this object in the left hand corner of the buckingham palace a few weeks after my trip. i was looking at pictures of my trip when i had reached this photo and noticed it right away. i showed it to my wife, and she didn't think it was nothing much, but possibly something on my lens or a plane. i told her that she was probably correct, till i showed her another photo 3-4 minutes later of the object in the background moving, that photo is not very clear (of course). have no idea of what it is, just thought it may be of interest to other people.
content.summary: Did not know it was there.

content.detailedDescription:
I was at my girlfriends home and her parents called us outside. they do not speak english but they were pointing at the sky so i looked up and saw the lights pulsating from a faint yellow then to red and back a glowing white. it was daytime so i assumed it was just a plane at first but there was not a cloud in the sky and i was unable to see what was in the middle. as if the lights were just there and the actual craft was invisible. after observing i pulled out my phone and it began to move back and forth. thats when i knew for a fact i was not looking at a plane considering planes cant move forward then move backward without turning around or at that speed. soon enough it was gone it didnt speed off into the sky it just disapeared. maybe 15 minutes later im back inside the house and i was able to hear helocopters so i looked out the window and sure enough there was two black helocopters side by side. and since that wasnt wierd enough the helocopters were almost circling the town as if it were looking for something. it wasnt a news helocopter it was not the coastgaurd which i do sometimes see. just pure black non writen on helocopters. during the sighting i was feeling more anxious then i beleive i ever have before not even a bad anxiety but just anxious for example im about to go on a trip somewhere i have always wanted to go. thats how i felt. for the next few days i could not stop thinking about it. i actually snapped a few pictures but i only actually caught the lights once so i do have one picture of what i was seeing. also before i forget the triangle lights had some sort of tail following it. another light that was going around it at some points but majority of the time behind it following it. the tail looked just like the other lights except when the triangle lights moved the never moved out of place from the triangle. just a perfect triangle the whole time while moving and while stationary. thank you i hope this helps feel few to email or whatever you want if you have anymore questions. 

in the photos it might seem like just a blue screen but take a closer look you will see the triangle and the tail.
content.summary: Lights in triangle formation pulsating colors moving all over the sky

content.detailedDescription: I live at one of the highest points in west haven so i have a clear view of the coast for many miles. for several months i have noticed a strange light high in the sky (at least once or twice a week and sometimes more often) that seems to be over the water. its a very bright flickering light that looks diamond shaped sometimes and triangular in shape other times. im not sure what town its actually over but i assume it might be new haven but could be as far away as branford or even guilford. i usually see it between 2am and 4am and its usually out there for at least 1 hour before disappearing. its always high in the sky and does not move for that particular night, however every night that i see it, its not always in the same location that it was the prior night when seen. for the past 2 nights there were 2 of these lights out there not far from each other. im really not sure what these lights are but there is something out there and just wanted to report it.
content.summary: Strange light high in the sky over the water several times a week

content.detailedDescription:
i was driving home from work south on the gs parkway when i noticed a red/white light flying around right before the mullica river. i thought it was the coast guard helo which is a common site in the ac area. but then it made an odd turn and dipped heading low towards my direction it actually scared me. then it turned and headed south in the direction i was going. i was not able to confirm that it was the helo and i thought maybe its a drone? then i see 4 or five more but smaller ones following each other and the first one all headed north along side the parkway. i continued south and i think they must have been drones but thought i would post this for anyone else who saw them. this is the area 
39.567687, -74.458898
content.summary: 5-6 red/white objects in a row

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving my car back home and was 2 mins from my doorstep.

i turned down the stoke orchard road, and observed two bright white lights in the sky, separated by about 11-15ft with a apparent wing span.

my fist initial thought was "plane"

i turned my focus back to the road... (as was driving)

then the lights got really bright, the middle part began to glow
the light was rippling around the middle part......

(at this point i kinda freaked out, as i knew it wasn't a plane)

it had a disc like doughnut shape i think, there was a slight tint of orange in the light in the middle as it reflected and rippled across its surface,

i began looking for somewhere to pull over which took me about 60 seconds, before i  was out the car again with phone in my hand and back at the spot. 

sadly it was too late....
- it had vanished (i did wait 5 mins).


by the way, the object was observed over a rubbish tip
which i found out today is a toxic waste site apparently.

thing is, this is not the first time i have seen this at that place.

saw the same thing 6 months ago (had a friend in the car).

could it be gas from the rubbish site? - maybe.

but what i saw yesterday, wasnt just lights it was.... well. solid.
content.summary: Two white lights seperated by about 11-15ft. at first thoguht a plane, then the middle part  began to glow and i could see it was nothing normal, but a disc, like maybe doughnut shape.

content.detailedDescription: Last night around 7:20-7:30 i was driving back with my father in law from helping a family member move some stuff into a storage unit. we were less then a mile from home when i noticed what looked like 2 shooting stars falling from the sky. i was the passenger and my father in law was driving. i said look what is that and at that time he looked and saw what appeared to be 2 shooting stars as well. they were falling parallel to each other. as i observed them falling for about 5-10 seconds all of the sudden they seamed to come to a stop and became 1 object. i asked my father in law what is that are you seeing that this is really weird and he confirmed that he saw what i was seeing. then where the 2 stars has joined and hauled there was a triangle shaped craft hovering. i asked my father in law if he saw the triangular shaped object as well and he confirmed that he did. there were aqua bluish lights luminicing under the triangular shaped object and it appeared to be hovering. the shooting star object that emerged from 2 to 1 was kind of dancing around the triangular craft moving back and forth. i kept asking my father in law if he was seeing what i was seeing as well and he confirmed. we were driving so my view was obstructed periodically as we passed by trees or buildings but i kept my focus on the object until we were in our neighborhood which is covered with trees and i loss sight of it. as soon as we got home i got out of the car and tried to observe the object from my driveway for about 10 mins but i couldn't relocate the object. i desperately wanted to get the object on camera but it just never reappeared. when i went in the house my father in law was discussing with some family members what we had saw. i gave my account of what i saw as well. he was the one driving and i was the passenger so i observed the object longer. my spouse and i went out to dinner a few minutes later and i caught myself fixated on the sky although this time i was the one driving. i really wanted to see the triangular shape craft again so i could get it on camera but i never saw it again. i have watched tv shows about ufos such as ufo hunters, hangar 1,ufo files ect. i've never seen a ufo before but i have had interest in them for years. what was surprising to me was that although the triangular shaped craft was common amongst those shows the whole ordeal with the 2 shooting stars that became 1 object was what i considered unique. that wasn't a sight i was familiar with from watching any ufo subject tv shows. later that night and first thing this morning i looked online to see if anyone else had saw what my father in law and i had seen but no reports as of yet. there were a lot of people out and about it was 7:30ish on a friday night in an atlanta suburb and i know we weren't the only ones to see the ordeal there's just no way. anyway that is my story
content.summary: Looked like 2 shooting stars then they emerged to form 1 and triangular craft next to it

content.detailedDescription: We were standing on the the balcony of my apartment which has a wide swath of open sky too gaze upon. i noticed a large light coming from the southwest at about 1015 pm. my friend criston mentioned hed never seen a plane come from the direction or one that big land in bakersfield as i live near airport. the air traffic comes from the south by southeast. we continued watching and realized this thing was moving alow. real slow. we wat hdd somewhat dumbfounded until the light slowly appeard too split into a perfect triangle with the 3 points of light spreading out slowly too the points where it help perfect shape and tumbled slowly end over end. i estimate from corner too corner too be at least 100-150 yards, this thing was massive!As it krept closer and kept a south too north by north east trajectory it passed over the apartments. by now many people qho were outside or driving by stopped and seen it. even a sherriffs deputy got out of his car snapped some pics and radiod this ii. i also got photos. asit started too move over the trees out of site we jumped in the truck and followed it with about 10 other vehicles in tow.We followed it a out 4 miles and it started too decend to barely 200 or so feet off theground. we pulled over as did everyone behind us and watched as it emitted a silvery bluesh flash almost like a flash bulb or lightening that lit the entire area up brighter than day light. it made alow grumbling hum and started too asscend back up and too the north eventualy out of sight. a sherriffs helicopter was seen about 15 minutes later hauling ass in the direction of this thing wbich ws now barely visible.A highway potroleman who saw us all pulled over got out and exclaimed " an you believe this crazy s#$%??" upon further conversation he said the police band and 911 were being bombarded with chatter which was later confirmed by kbak eyewitness news own news desk manager. i sent him my photos that night and when he and a rwporter were working on a top off piece for the next mornings news they were abruptly ordered by the main station director that no story would be ran and it was a non-story. come too find out meadows field diverted air traffic for 3 hours that night starting at 9:50 pm. i learned all this from talming toothe news deak manager the next day. aftfer the large craft was gone id say 45 mi utes or so we zaw a second smaller faster craft which lookedtoo split into 2 and reform while jetting towards the direction the larger craft flew. i have enclosed picsfrom that evening.
content.summary: Gigantic triangle that formed from a si gle orb into 3 smaller orbs at points of triangle. blocked stars and made a dull humming sound. an hour or so later we then saw another strange craft possibly 2 following the same path as triangle. c

content.detailedDescription:
I woke up late that saturday night because of load music, someone was having a party that went really late. i went outside and it was a nice night, a very dark night because the moon was just a sliver. it was really clear so i got my binoculars to look at the stars. i noticed this bright large orange ball just atop my nieghbors house. at first i thought it was an outdoor light that the people next to them had for the party. about 5 minutes later i saw that it was no longer atop the house but a few inches higher, which would really be miles. i watched it thru my binocs for awhile. i thought that it must be venus, but the more i watched i changed my mind. besides that about 15 minutes after i first saw this ball another one appeared to the northeast of this one, lower, smaller, much farther away. that one i couldn't really get on my camera, but i thought maybe that one is venus and there couldn't be two.  
one thing about both of these balls is that they both had much smaller balls, one each, a few inches (again miles) above them that moved with them. these smaller ones were little more than dots compared to the big ones and they flashed red, blue, green in that order, red on the left blue in the center and green on the right.
i saw this sunday morning oct 10th starting at approx 3:30 a.M. i watched it for about 15 minutes, filmed it for 7-8 minutes. what i watched thru my  camera on the camera's lcd screen did not look like what appeared after downloading it to my pc.
i have an olympus sz-14/sz-12 digital camera. i was using optical zoom. i zoomed in and stayed zoomed in the entire time. so when it shrinks and then flares out again or changes color that's it's doing. there's a little bit of shakiness, but for the most part i had my elbows planted firmly on the top of my fence and kept pretty still. the object would move up and to the left so i would adjust myself to center object in the screen of the camera. at one point, when looking thru my binocs it was very white and there were red streaks coming out of the top sides meeting in the center continously flashing, it only lasted about 20-30 seconds. a couple times it seemed to change shape. that's when i went for my camera and started filming but those things didn't happen again. once i got it on my computer i saw a definite outer ring and several dark spots, lights? in the center. this is very wierd, is it venus, is it a star, are planets or stars capable of being so perfectly round and flashing like that?
also if they are a star or planet how come they haven't been out again yet since that night? i've been looking.
content.summary: Bright pulsating ball of orange light, first above nieghbors house then rising higher and higher. looked at thru binoculars, very odd, got camera and filmed for several minutes. didn't look like a star or planet, seemed to be within earth's atmosphere
